column4: We are making great progress towards a safe, effective COVID-19 vaccine. Medical professionals in Congress are leading by example and volunteering for these trials because we trust the science. https://t.co/3eSbMZU8B3

MYTH: The government will force you to take the COVID-19 vaccine.

FACT: We do not have mandatory vaccinations, and this one will be no different. https://t.co/cgoXSH7v2y
My prayers are with the first family as they personally battle this virus.

The GOP Doctors Caucus had an insightful virtual tour of the @NIH this morning to learn more about our country‚Äôs all-hands-on-deck fight against COVID-19 #OperationWarpSpeed. We WILL restore our way of life SOON. https://t.co/0LciRDmPyY

We‚Äôre at a crucial moment in our nation‚Äôs fight against COVID-19, standing at the precipice of developing a vaccine that will enable us to return to normal. The scientific progress we‚Äôve made has been nothing short of a miracle, and Dr. Slaoui has been instrumental in this effort

This December will be 50 yrs since I graduated medical school. I don‚Äôt remember a time in my life where we found an infectious disease where within 8 months we had cut the mortality rate by over 40%. That is literally unheard of. We've learned a lot and will beat this virus soon. https://t.co/DmOTpZ5xRl

We want a safe, effective vaccine like we have for polio. I remember as a boy when the polio vaccine came out, literally overnight we eliminated polio as a risk. Many of my friends developed polio before the vaccine was available, but I was lucky. We'll beat COVID-19 too. https://t.co/S5I46NxVks

I came to Congress because I realized physicians have to be involved in healthcare policy decisions. We‚Äôve been able to share insight about how changes would actually play out, and it‚Äôs been an honor helping lead this hard-working caucus. 

https://t.co/3w0Hn32JYB

The COVID-19 vaccine will go through ALL the rigorous research and approval steps that vaccines normally go through. As a doctor, we weigh the benefits vs risks for patients. I‚Äôm very familiar with this process and will certainly take it myself when it‚Äôs publicly available. https://t.co/5ItsNDiByF

Operation Warp Speed is America‚Äôs all-hands-on-deck response to COVID-19. We‚Äôre strategically funding promising vaccine candidates and prioritizing their approval process and manufacturing. https://t.co/NXg8mYwV5A
Congress should be working every day until a deal is reached on pandemic relief. There are so many important issues we could be working on rather than sitting at home while the country waits.
Rural health providers have been hit hard by the pandemic. @realDonaldTrump‚Äôs EO this past Monday creates a new model that will allow us to transform the way care is delivered in rural communities.
